docs.lead_paragraph: The Moore-McCormack Lines announced yesterday that a new intermediate cargo service between New York and South American regions not fully covered by the present American Republics Line vessels would be started in January with a fleet of five new vessels.

headline.main: NEW RUNS PLANNED TO SOUTH AMERICA; Moors-McCormack Lines Will Open Cargo Service From This Port in January FIVE VESSELS IN FLEET Fortnightly Schedule Aims to Cut Time of Deliveries to Important Markets Sailing on Jan. 13 Erpress Service to Continue

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 20 --Captain Hans Langsdorff made one very serious psychological error which undoubtedly contributed heavily to the disillusionment and depression which must have led to his suicide. Like so many Germans before him have...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 20 --Captain Hans Langsdorff made one very serious psychological error which undoubtedly contributed heavily to the disillusionment and depression which must have led to his suicide. Like so many Germans before him have done, he failed to understand the Latin character.

docs.snippet: Lying doesn't always pay. There are times when it is expedient to tell the truth. But German officialdom now apparently lies on principle, no matter how much it stands to lose by adhering to the principle.

docs.lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Dec. 21--The German Government today sent a "sharp protest" to Argentina against the internment of the members of the crew of the German pocket battleship Admiral Graf Spee, which was sunk Sunday at Chancellor Hitler's command off the coast of Uruguay.
